name: Rebuild the Forests!!!
description:
Rebuild the forest and save the environment in this clicker Game!!!

All art done by yours truly 

Music was found on this website

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/peaceful-and-rela...

This was an enjoyable project to work on I learned a lot about UI and even made a start menu. First very much finished Game that I have really done by myself.
